欽.definition: to respect; to admire; to venerate; by the emperor himself

欽佩.definition: to admire; to look up to; to respect sb greatly

欽北.definition: Qinbei district of Qinzhou city 欽州市|钦州市[Qin1 zhou1 shi4], Guangxi

欽北區.definition: Qinbei district of Qinzhou city 欽州市|钦州市[Qin1 zhou1 shi4], Guangxi

欽南.definition: Qinnan district of Qinzhou city 欽州市|钦州市[Qin1 zhou1 shi4], Guangxi

欽南區.definition: Qinnan district of Qinzhou city 欽州市|钦州市[Qin1 zhou1 shi4], Guangxi

欽奈.definition: Chennai, capital of southeast Indian state Tamil Nadu 泰米爾納德邦|泰米尔纳德邦[Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1]; formerly called Madras 馬德拉斯|马德拉斯[Ma3 de2 la1 si1]

欽定.definition: to authorize; to designate; (old) to be compiled and published by imperial command

欽州.definition: see 欽州市|钦州市[Qin1zhou1 Shi4]

欽州市.definition: Qinzhou, prefecture-level city in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3xi1 Zhuang4zu2 Zi4zhi4qu1]

欽挹.definition: to admire and respect; to look up to

欽犯.definition: criminal whose arrest has been ordered by the emperor

欽羨.definition: to admire; to hold in high esteem
